definition: A farewell greeting typically used when parting from someone, expressing good wishes or bidding goodbye. It is commonly employed in various social settings, such as when saying goodbye to friends, colleagues, or acquaintances.

examples.english: The farewell greeting was very emotional

examples.german: Sie schickte ihm einen Abschiedsgruß per E-Mail
examples.english: She sent him a farewell greeting via email

examples.german: Der Abschiedsgruß wurde von allen Teilnehmern gesprochen
examples.english: The farewell greeting was spoken by all participants

examples.german: Er hinterließ einen Abschiedsgruß in ihrem Tagebuch
examples.english: He left a farewell greeting in her diary
